name: BimRetail.uz
description: BIM Retail is a young and growing brand in Tashkent that combines a café with a specialized Korean goods store. It focuses on delicious drinks, trendy snacks, and a vibrant atmosphere, actively expanding its network through franchising.

name: mu1zi47.vercel.app
description: mu1zi47.vercel.app is the personal portfolio of a frontend developer from Tashkent, showcasing the author’s unique style, approach, and professionalism. The project features real case studies, a clean and modern design, responsive interface, and high performance. It serves as an entry point for potential clients and collaborators, as well as a platform to demonstrate technical stack, code quality, and visual taste.
